dataList.title: The Hierarch of Hongyuan
dataList.content: What? Do you have something to say to my face?
Yeah. Don't give my little brother your crap.

dataList.title: The Hierarch of Hongyuan
dataList.content: Your little... brother?
You know who I'm talking about. Do you have any idea of the mess you left behind when you yoinked that kid away?
<That buzzcut kid was... her little brother.>
You can barely even hold onto your seat, which you're about to lose soon anyway... And you have the gall to give him false hope?
I know it's all just politics to you, but... kids really believe you, you know?

dataList.title: The Hierarch of Hongyuan
dataList.content: ... I heard from the kid that you seemed relieved upon hearing what I said.

dataList.title: The Hierarch of Hongyuan
dataList.content: Told me you were happy for once to hear that he had a fun time, after being barred from playing with his friends with how things are in Hongyuan.
Sh-shut up.

dataList.title: The Hierarch of Hongyuan
dataList.content: Besides... it's not all just hot air.
What…?

dataList.title: The Hierarch of Hongyuan
dataList.content: I wasn't making an empty promise when I said I will change Hongyuan to be a place where everyone can live without fear.

dataList.title: The Hierarch of Hongyuan
dataList.content: And for that... I'm going to protect my seat of power, no matter what it takes.
You'll fail.

dataList.title: The Hierarch of Hongyuan
dataList.content: Not with you on my side.

dataList.title: The Hierarch of Hongyuan
dataList.content: We all know what big sister Yuanchun's Hongyuan looks like. It'll be exactly the same in essence, and will be the same for the foreseeable future.

dataList.title: The Hierarch of Hongyuan
dataList.content: Tell me. Are you sure you're okay with handing over that same burden we've carried all our lives to... your little siblings?
... No, of course not.
Wang Qingshan left in a hurry.
But... that look in her eyes told me that there was conflict brewing in her.
